name: Cookie In Corona
description:
Help the protagonist in this virus infested world to navigate through the cities, running from the virus, using sanitizers and masks to your advantages and reach the ultimate prize(the COOKIE).

CONTROL:
Use WASD or Arrows to navigate.
Pickup sanitizer to move faster.
Pickup up mask to pass through the infected area without dying

LEADERBOARD:
Post your record time run(with video proof) on our discord server, and get your name on the leaderboard on the discord server, popinkode.itch.io and invarrow.itch.io

leaderboard catagories:
1; Full run(single streak)
2; Full run(discrete)
3; Each level separatly

INSTRUCTIONS:

Extract the files and run CookieInCorona.exe
